mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARKING_VISIT (VISITCAR_NO, CAR_NO, VISITCAR_PHONE, VISITCAR_DATE, PURPOSE, STATUS, USER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_VCNO.NEXTVAL, #{carNo}, #{visitCarPhone}, #{visitCarDate}, #{purpose}, 'W', #{userNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE PARKING_VISIT SET STATUS = CASE WHEN VISITCAR_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'Y' WHEN VISITCAR_DATE > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'W' ELSE 'N' END
mapper.select: SELECT VISITCAR_NO, CAR_NO, VISITCAR_PHONE, TO_CHAR(VISITCAR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VISITCAR_DATE, PURPOSE, P.STATUS, APT_NO, P.USER_NO FROM PARKING_VISIT P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND M.APT_NO = #{aptNo} AND P.STATUS IN('Y','W') ORDER BY VISITCAR_DATE ASC

SELECT VISITCAR_NO, CAR_NO, VISITCAR_PHONE, TO_CHAR(VISITCAR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VISITCAR_DATE, PURPOSE, P.STATUS, APT_NO, P.USER_NO FROM PARKING_VISIT P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO ORDER BY VISITCAR_DATE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING_VISIT JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE APT_NO = (SELECT APT_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) AND TRUNC(VISITCAR_DATE, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')
